# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Creates a document properties object from document data at the URL you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL that points to the document data.

## Discussion

When you initialize a document properties object with a URL, UIKit automatically finds the corresponding metadata and stores it in the document properties object’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentProperties/metadata] property.

## Creating a document header

- **init(metadata:)**: Creates a document properties object from the metadata object you specify.
- **metadata**: The document’s metadata.
